projects.name: Quran Portal
projects.desc: A web based Quran app and prayer schedule that uses the public API from [gadingnst](https://github.com/gadingnst/quran-api) and prayed schedule API from [lakuapik](https://github.com/lakuapik/jadwalsholatorg), equipped with several features such as dark theme, murottal, Indonesian translation, interpretation of surah/verses, and several other features

projects.name: Chomp Restaurant
projects.desc: A web burger restaurant to order burgers, drinks and sides. built using next js and tailwind CSS with React context state management

projects.name: Find Trend
projects.desc: Landing page that has an interactive and responsive display, introduces you to the projects I have completed. I try to combine the beauty of design with powerful functionality to provide a pleasant user experience.
